evidence.description: STREAM_INTENT.md read and analyzed - DD date calendar picker improvement scope defined with contact details verification requirements

contract_items.content: Load project_state.json and extract key parameters

evidence.description: Project state loaded - UI improvement scope confirmed with focus on DD date picker, calendar integration, contact details verification, and mobile responsiveness

contract_items.content: Assess current form structure and DD date implementation

evidence.content: Current form structure assessed: Contact details section with 5 fields (name, phone, email, address, postcode), payment section with DD date dropdown limited to 5 preset options (1st, 8th, 15th, 22nd, 28th), form uses client-side validation and Firebase submission with proper authentication flow

contract_items.content: Document UI improvement requirements and constraints

evidence.content: UI improvement requirements documented: Calendar picker for any current month date, mobile-friendly touch interaction, accessibility compliance, integration with existing form validation and submission, contact details section verification, no breaking changes to current functionality
